content: Here you will find a list of the recently opened files shared with you via an external link.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a description that appears when users view an empty folder or container, indicating there are recently shared files available to access.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'via an external link' is translated as 'xarici keçid vasitəsilə'. While technically correct, a more natural and idiomatic translation might be 'xarici bağlantı vasitəsilə' or 'xarici link vasitəsilə'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'xarici bağlantı vasitəsilə' or 'xarici link vasitəsilə'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'die über einen externen Link für Sie freigegeben wurden' is slightly awkward and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'shared with you via an external link'. It literally translates to 'that were released for you via an external link'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like 'die Ihnen über einen externen Link zur Verfügung gestellt wurden' (that were made available to you via an external link) or 'die über einen externen Link mit Ihnen geteilt wurden' (that were shared with you via an external link).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Aquí encontrará una lista de los archivos abiertos recientemente y compartidos con usted a través de un enlace externo' is a literal translation and slightly awkward. A more natural Spanish phrasing would emphasize the receiving of the files via link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aquí encontrará una lista de los archivos abiertos recientemente que le han sido compartidos a través de un enlace externo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Here you will find' is more literally translated as 'Ici vous trouverez'. The translation 'Vous y trouverez' is more idiomatic and generally preferred for UI text, but subtly shifts the focus from the user's perspective ('Here, *you* will find') to a more general statement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous trouverez ici une liste des fichiers récemment ouverts qui ont été partagés avec vous via le lien externe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "որոնք ձեզ հետ կիսվել են արտաքին հղման միջոցով" is a bit awkward. A more natural translation of "shared with you via an external link" would be something like "որոնք ձեզ փոխանցվել են արտաքին հղմամբ" or "որոնք ձեզ ուղարկվել են արտաքին հղմամբ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Այստեղ դուք կգտնեք վերջերս բացված ֆայլերի ցանկը, որոնք ձեզ փոխանցվել են արտաքին հղմամբ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '여기에서는 외부 링크를 통해 공유된 최근에 열었던 파일 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다.' is a bit literal and clunky. A more natural Korean phrasing would convey the same meaning more smoothly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 여기서는 외부 링크를 통해 공유된 최근 파일 목록을 볼 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '최근에 열었던' (recent opened) is less common and more verbose than just '최근' (recent) in this context. It adds unnecessary complexity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Using '최근' instead of '최근에 열었던' makes the sentence more concise and natural.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່' (connection) could be more precisely translated as 'ລິ້ງ' (link) in this context. While 'ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່' is technically correct, 'ລິ້ງ' is more commonly used for external links.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທີ່ນີ້ເຈົ້າຈະພົບເຫັນບັນຊີລາຍຊື່ຂອງໄຟລ໌ທີ່ເປີດບໍ່ດົນມານີ້ແບ່ງປັນກັບທ່ານໂດຍຜ່ານລິ້ງພາຍນອກ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, the phrase 'ກັບທ່ານ' (with you) feels slightly formal. In a user interface, a more conversational tone might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທີ່ນີ້ເຈົ້າຈະພົບເຫັນບັນຊີລາຍຊື່ຂອງໄຟລ໌ທີ່ເປີດບໍ່ດົນມານີ້ແບ່ງປັນໃຫ້ເຈົ້າໂດຍຜ່ານລິ້ງພາຍນອກ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'prin un link extern' is grammatically awkward. It should be 'prin intermediul unui link extern' or 'prin link extern'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aici veți găsi lista fișierelor deschise recent, care au fost partajate cu dvs. prin intermediul unui link extern.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'fișierelor' is technically correct, it's slightly less natural in this context. 'fișiere' is arguably more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aici veți găsi lista fișiere deschise recent, care au fost partajate cu dvs. prin intermediul unui link extern.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'shared with you' is not accurately conveyed by 'которым вам предоставили доступ'. A more accurate translation would be 'отправленные вам' or 'переданные вам'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Здесь вы найдете список недавно открытых файлов, отправленные вам по внешней ссылке.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'සබැඳියකින්' is a slightly awkward phrasing. It's technically correct but could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: බාහිර සබැඳිය හරහා ඔබ සමඟ බෙදාගත්

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'මෙහි දිස් වනු ඇත' is passive and slightly less natural in Sinhala compared to a more active voice.  While not incorrect, it can be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම ස්ථානයේ ඔබට දැකිය හැකිය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'shared with you' is not accurately translated. 'V skupni rabi z vami' is a literal translation and sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would better convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'poslane vam' or 'deljene z vami' instead of 'v skupni rabi z vami'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'датотека' is technically correct but sounds a bit formal and less natural in this context. 'Фaјл' or 'датотеке' would be more commonly used and understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Фaјл or Датотеке

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'спољни линк' is understandable, 'спољна веза' is a more common and natural way to say 'external link' in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: спољна веза

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'linka' is a colloquial shortening of 'veza' and might be perceived as informal. While understandable, 'linka' is not the standard term for 'link'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ovde ćete pronaći listu nedavno otvorenih datoteka deljenih sa vama putem spoljnog linka/veze.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "до яких вам надано доступ" is overly literal and formal. A more natural and concise translation would better convey the meaning of 'shared with you'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тут ви знайдете список нещодавно відкритих файлів, якими з вами поділилися через зовнішнє посилання.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'з вами поділилися' is slightly less common than a more colloquial phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тут ви знайдете список нещодавно відкритих файлів, якими ви отримали через зовнішнє посилання.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "shared with you via an external link" is a bit literal and could be more natural in Vietnamese. 'Through an external link' can sound awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tại đây, bạn sẽ tìm thấy danh sách các tập tin đã được mở gần đây được chia sẻ với bạn qua liên kết ngoài.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '通过外部链接与您共享的' is a bit lengthy and could be simplified for better readability in Chinese. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以通过外部链接接收的文件列表
